name: River Raft
description:
In River raft you control this jovial fella travelling through the hazardous river on his raft. You'll have to collect pieces and expand your raft to protect yourself against the on coming dangers.

  • (E) Steering wheel - Turn the raft left and right
  • (E) Chest - If any item is collected, this allows you to place the collected item against the borders of your raft
  • Collecting items - Bump into them with your raft

Submission for GMTK GameJam 2021 - Theme: Joined together

Our connection to the theme is the act of collecting new ship pieces and connecting them to your raft.

By Rosario Baarh, Floyd Krielaart, Adriaan Scheepers
